pros: Very easy to work and not much pressure.
cons: There weren't any cons for working at the Federation

pros: You’ll learn a lot You’ll work with people from various backgrounds who are widely educated You’ll learn a lot about memberships and academic politics
cons: The work life balance is not good despite organizational marketing, largely because there is a lack of understanding about what roles entail. It can be incredibly stressful. It functions poorly, which is surprising since it’s such a small organization. Leadership cannot get on the same page. Medium pay for maximum effort
